content: *turns out my lady spinderella pattern can also fit the elf hat and you can turn your lady spinderellas into christmas elves too lady spinderella pattern can be found here - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lady-spinderella-doll now that it s november the toads need a new hat something christmas-y of course and i think i ve designed just the right hat for them - a christmas elf hat - so they can bring all the mistletoad fun into your holiday season many many thanks for all the continuing support of my little toad pattern please enjoy this free gift from me and i give you all the warmest wishes for a wonderful christmas and a happy new year *note the 2 toads i made to model the elf hats are made from my toad pattern but i ve adjusted a couple of things from the original pattern to make the toad a bit smaller i use 2 mm needles instead of 2 5 mm and use 16 mm safety eyes instead of 14 mm and i don t do the eye folds when putting the toad together for further details you can check out my projects page https //www ravelry com/projects/magewoodwhimsies/toad-familiar-16 https //www ravelry com/projects/magewoodwhimsies/toad-familiar-15 original toad pattern can be found here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/toad-familiar-2
